summary.body: Hi there I have a broken foot and cannot walk. If I heal in September I need physiotherapy is the Bupa here at Barbican good? I have a broken metatarsal ( Rooney) plus a syndrome of the ligaments I need really good physio. I did not like Charterhouse square I've tried the physiocenter near the Church not great. What are the prices? Can people come at your place? Ta
summary.subject: Broken foot/Bupa barbican
